scripts._dev:cap: sleep 5 && cp capacitor.config.local.ts capacitor.config.ts && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && adb uninstall com.landwash.intern || true && adb install app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk && cd ..
scripts._dev:cap:ios: sleep 5 && cp capacitor.config.local.ts capacitor.config.ts && npx cap sync ios && open -a Simulator && xcrun simctl boot 772E813C-D012-47AE-8C9E-429B63021448 || true && cd ios/App && pod install && xcodebuild -workspace App.xcworkspace -scheme App -configuration Debug -destination 'id=772E813C-D012-47AE-8C9E-429B63021448' build && APP_PATH=$(find ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData -type d -path '*/Build/Products/Debug-iphonesimulator/App.app' ! -path '*/Index.noindex/*' | head -n 1) && echo 'Installing from:' $APP_PATH && xcrun simctl install 772E813C-D012-47AE-8C9E-429B63021448 "$APP_PATH" && xcrun simctl launch 772E813C-D012-47AE-8C9E-429B63021448 com.landwash.intern && cd ../..
scripts._dev:logs:ios: xcrun simctl spawn booted log stream --predicate 'eventMessage CONTAINS "http://192.168.1.67:4200"'
